channel.title: Making new p rights and giving them crowns?
channel.description: how do i do what title says?

item.title: Making new p rights and giving them crowns?
item.dc:creator: @monkey_money30 monkey money30
item.description:
@monkey_money30 wrote:

Open charactors folder and go to players username folder and it says players-rights = 0 change it to player-rights = 1 mod 2 admin 3 owner 4 hidden owner like this

[code][ACCOUNT]
character-username = User-name
character-password = password

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 2856
character-posy = 3590
character-rights = 0 (normal player) 1 (moderator) 2(admin) 3(owner) 4(hidden owner)
character-ismember = 0
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = 0
character-lastlogin = 0
character-energy = 23
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 0

[EQUIPMENT]

[LOOK]

[SKILLS]
character-skill = 0 1 0
character-skill = 1 1 0
character-skill = 2 1 0
character-skill = 3 1 0
character-skill = 4 1 0
character-skill = 5 1 0
character-skill = 6 1 0
character-skill = 7 1 0
character-skill = 8 1 0
character-skill = 9 1 0
character-skill = 10 1 0
character-skill = 11 1 0
character-skill = 12 1 0
character-skill = 13 1 0
character-skill = 14 1 0
character-skill = 15 1 0
character-skill = 16 1 0
character-skill = 17 1 0
character-skill = 18 1 0
character-skill = 19 1 0
character-skill = 20 1 0
character-skill = 21 1 0
character-skill = 22 1 0
character-skill = 23 1 0
character-skill = 24 1 0

[ITEMS]

[BANK]

[FRIENDS]

[IGNORES]

[EOF]

[/code]
